org.usfirst.ftc.avalancherobotics.v2.modules

Class DriveTrainController

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.usfirst.ftc.avalancherobotics.v2.modules.DriveTrainController

  • public class DriveTrainController
extends java.lang.Object
    Code for DriveTrain Initialize in main TeleOp class call manualDrive in a recursive loop updating the left and right inputs Use setDriveMode to change controls between tank and arcade (defaults to tank)
